snippet: Wall Street investors hope that a Federal Reserve under Janet L. Yellen will telegraph its intentions to the markets, particularly as it tapers efforts to kindle growth.
abstract: Wall Street investors hope that a Federal Reserve under Janet L Yellen will telegraph its intentions to the markets, particularly as it tapers efforts to kindle growth; view is Yellen, described as methodical, will generally maintain policies of current chairman Ben S Bernanke, while pressing for even greater transparency.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street investors hope that a Federal Reserve under Janet L. Yellen will telegraph its intentions to the markets, particularly as it tapers efforts to kindle growth.

headline.main: The Yellen Fed? Precise and Predictable
headline.print_headline: The Yellen Fed? Precise and Predictable
